content: Hello, I'm writing an english paper and the topic of Iraq came up. So I figured the best way to see what people are thinking id to ask. So if you feel strongly that we should leave Iraq and you think you have a plan to do it please fire away. Like wise if you feel leaving Iraq in the next few years is still to soon tell me why. For those of you who respond with information I can use I will ask if I can put your screen name in my paper. Thanks in advance look forward to your answers

title: Reasons why we should leave Iraq soon or Stay in Iraq longer
